author: Special Correspondent
text:
Chief Minister Jayalalithaa has congratulated V. Shanta, chairperson of the Cancer Institute, on being honoured with Padma Vibhushan. “It is a matter of great happiness that the State government’s recommendation to confer the Padma Vibhushan on you has been accepted by the Government of India. This richly deserved award appropriately recognises the decades of dedicated and selfless service that you have rendered to the cause of preventing and curing cancer,” the Chief Minister said. Lakhs of patients and their families benefited from her service Ms. Jayalalithaa said, adding, “You have been an institution builder, making the Cancer Institute in Chennai a nationally recognised institution. You have done the State proud.”

‘You have made the Cancer Institute a nationally recognised institution’
title: CM congratulates Shanta
